liste.punkt: You apply on the form Requirements for pregnancy allowance for self-employed and freelancers. Both you and the doctor or midwife must fill out their part of the form.
Doctor or midwife assesses the risk of the unborn child. You must consider yourself whether you can arrange your job so that there is no risk for the child.
Along with the application form, you submit the form Income information for self-employed / freelancer.
